channel.title: How to tell if you can pass a drug test for free (hopefully)
channel.description:
Hello mopar-ers, this is my christmas gift to you. I recently found something out that I think the online community should be aware of. I don't know exactly how it works, but I know enough about the method to tell you what to do, and why it works.
Things Needed:
[ul][li]Horny Girl[/li] [li]Ear Wax[/li] [li]Pinky finger[/li][/ul]
The directions, well if you haven't already guessed...
1. Get things hot'n'heavy with your lady friend, to the point of 2nd base (touch) 2. Before your fingers enter, stick your fingers in your ear, if you clean your ears properly, then you wont get a lot, but try to get as much as possible. 3. Enter, if the girl tells you it stings badly, you sir (or madame), can not pass a drug test.
I don't know if this works with both guys and girls, and I didn't believe it myself until I was at a party one night, and me and my friends were talking about it, and then the next morning when we woke up, my friend told me it's true, so I guess I believe it.
I heard this from a friend of a friend, and he said something about the chemical delta 9, and how it made it hurt.
Sorry if you were disgusted or offended, but I'm just trying to help.
Happy Yule,
Buzzy

item.title: How to tell if you can pass a drug test for free (hopefully)
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Frostie21:

Could of also let it die Jme,instead of doing a 10day bump to tell that idiot he shouldn’t have bumped it in the first place.

Could you not have done the same?

Luckily, I have a more effective method at my disposal.

Read full topic

item.title: How to tell if you can pass a drug test for free (hopefully)
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:15, topic:167727”][quote author=KrIsPi KrEmE link=topic=227165.msg2373573#msg2373573 date=1218327360]

Lawl. I have no scientific proof because I honestly don’t know what search tags that would pertain to… “ear, wax, drug test, vagina” I’m gonna get some realllly kinky straight porno involving the aggression of a man who failed a drug test so he raped his tester in the ear, but died a week later from kewd (Killer Ear Wax Disease).
[/quote]Damn it, you just made me hard.

Can you say that on this forum?

you can say a lot of things.

So true! i mean i can say just about anything i want! Almost anything… Gets Banned By Epic Phail Andrew Gower

You just bumped a topic from december 2007… are you an idiot? Bumps are ok if you have something worth saying, but you’re just creating spam.

Oh and for the record this method of seeing if you will pass a drug test, won’t work.[/quote]

Could of also let it die Jme,instead of doing a 10day bump to tell that idiot he shouldn’t have bumped it in the first place.

Read full topic
